In the 2019 movie 'Chhichhore', which artists performed the song 'Fikar Not' featured in its soundtrack?
Options:
A. Amit Mishra, Neha Kakkar, Vishal Dadlani, Shreya Ghoshal
B. Nakash Aziz, Dev Negi, Antara Mitra, Amit Mishra, Sreerama Chandra, Amitabh Bhattacharya
C. Arijit Singh, Sunidhi Chauhan, Badshah, Tulsi Kumar
D. Amaal Mallik, Jonita Gandhi, Armaan Malik, Shreya Ghoshal

C. A. R. Rahman, Sonu Nigam, and Sunidhi Chauhan
